PackageData0.Name: Ray4Laz
PackageData0.CommunityDescription: Headers translation of the Raylib game development library. Inspired by Borland BGI graphics lib and by XNA framework.

PackageFiles0.Name: ray4laz.lpk
PackageFiles0.Description: A complete header translation (binding) of the raylib 5.5 to Pascal. Without any funky helper functions for memory alignment issues. Inspired and partially based on the drezgames/raylib-pascal binding, however a little cleaner and more recent, with FPC 3.2.0 support.
PackageFiles0.Author: Gunko Vadim
PackageFiles0.SupportedWidgetSet: cocoa, gtk2, gtk3, qt, qt5, qt6, win32/win64

PackageFiles0.Name: ray4laz_designtime.lpk
PackageFiles0.Author: Gunko Vadim guvacode@gmail.com
PackageFiles0.SupportedWidgetSet: cocoa, gtk2, gtk3, qt, qt5, qt6, win32/win64
